sentences.en: A scene of unparalleled grandeur is revealed late at night.
sentences.cn: 一派特别雄伟的景象,出现在深宵.

sentences.en: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status.
sentences.cn: 圆柱在建筑中通常用来增添气势和显示地位。

sentences.en: He is wholly concerned with his own grandeur.
sentences.cn: 他只关心自己的显赫地位。

sentences.en: He suggested that we suffer delusions of grandeur as a football nation.
sentences.cn: 他暗示我们妄自尊大地以为自己是个足球民族。
他的财富令他地位显赫.

sentences.en: I must disabuse you of your feelings of grandeur.
sentences.cn: 我必须去消除你的傲气.

sentences.en: In Brahamanic and later times, Indra slowly lost much of his grandeur.
sentences.cn: 在婆罗门时期及其之后, 因陀罗逐渐失去了许多原来的荣光.

sentences.en: Only inside do you appreciate the church's true grandeur.
sentences.cn: 只有深入其中，你才能真正欣赏教堂的富丽堂皇。

sentences.en: She wants to travel first - class: she must have delusions of grandeur.
sentences.cn: 她想坐头等舱旅行,她一定自以为很了不起.

sentences.en: Still, the conflict restores his sense of human grandeur.
sentences.cn: 不过这场冲突使他恢复了他人类尊严感.

sentences.en: That's what we tried to portray in the book, this feeling of opulence and grandeur.
sentences.cn: 那就是我们在书中竭力描绘的——一种富丽堂皇的气派。

sentences.en: the grandeur and simplicity of Roman architecture
sentences.cn: 古罗马建筑的雄伟和简朴

sentences.en: The grandeur of the Great Wall is unmatched.
sentences.cn: 长城的壮观是独一无二的.

sentences.en: The most visited city in the world, here is a capital whose great talent has been to interweave the grandeur of its official buildings with the everyday charm of its many quartiers.
sentences.cn: 世界上访问者最多的城市，就是这里，拥有庞大人才资本的首都，这城市中庄严肃穆的官方建筑与许多城区的日常魅力始终融合在一起。

sentences.en: The painting shows the grandeur, of the royal palace.
sentences.cn: 这幅油画显示了皇宫的富丽堂皇.

sentences.en: Their music speaks to us with an innate grandeur we can all understand.
sentences.cn: 他们的音乐里流露出一种我们都能体会到的天生的高贵。

trans.tran_cn: 伟大，宏伟，壮观，富丽堂皇
